data.title: Order of Gunnhildur Books
data.meta_description: This is the Order of Gunnhildur Books in both chronological order and publication order. List verified daily and newest books added immediately.
data.text:
The Gunnhildur series is a series of Scandinavian crime fiction novels by English novelist Quentin Bates. The series follows Gunnhildur “Gunna” Gisladottir, a female police sergeant in rural Iceland.

Quentin Bates began his Gunnhildur series in 2011 with the novel Frozen Assets (aka Frozen Out). The series is currently ongoing. Below is a list of Quentin Bates’ Gunnhildur books in order of when they were originally published (which is the same as their chronological order):

Get notified when Quentin Bates releases a new book at BookNotification.com.

Publication Order of Officer Gunnhildur Books

Frozen Assets / Frozen Out(2010)Amazon.com | Amazon.deCold Comfort(2012)Amazon.com | Amazon.deWinterlude(2013)Amazon.com | Amazon.deChilled to the Bone(2013)Amazon.com | Amazon.deCold Steal(2014)Amazon.com | Amazon.deSummerchill(2015)Amazon.com | Amazon.deThin Ice(2016)Amazon.com | Amazon.deCold Breath(2018)Amazon.com | Amazon.deCold Malice(2020)Amazon.com | Amazon.de

Note: Frozen Assets was published as Frozen Out in the United States.

If You Like Officer Gunnhildur Books, You’ll Love…

Inspector Anders Knutas

Inspector Huss

Ann Lindell

Officer Gunnhildur Synopsis: Frozen Assets (aka Frozen Out) is the first book in the Officer Gunnhilder series by Quentin Bates. A corpse is found in an Icelandic fishing village harbour. Is this the result of an accident or was it foul play? Eyes are on Officer Gunnhildur in order to find out. She looks into a web of corruption that traces back to major businesses and banks in Iceland. To make things more complicated, a newbie reporter is trying to get a scoop off of her and a blogger is not making things easier. And then, a second body is added to the picture.

Shop Worldwide: Amazon.com | Amazon.co.uk | Amazon.ca

We do our best to get everything listed but the occasional book gets by us. If you see anything missing please let us know so we can add it ASAP. You can also use this form to request we add new authors. Thanks. You can also e-mail us with any feedback at site@orderofbooks.com.
